Property.name: title
Property.HelpText: Changes the theme on the Title Screen.

Property.name: plus
Property.HelpText: Removes the sound effect that plays on the Title Screen when the Plus DLC is installed. Highly recommended to be used in conjunction with the above option due to how out of place it sounds with the orchestrated music playing behind it.

Property.HelpText: Changes the theme in the first intro animation.
